name: Soccer Rush - Dribbling Runner
description:
Your have to run with the soccer ball as long as possible, soccer defenders will chase you to take away the ball. Trick the defenders with a dribbling, dodge, use the joystick or tap game control. Accumulate bonuses and discover the best players of the world!

AR - Augmented Reality Mode !!! Try it !!!!

Discover the full game potential using the Augmented Reality mode. Now the gameplay can be deployed on any surface - imagine the situation when a famous world-class football player works on your table!

◈ Ability to play for your favorite players
◈ Augmented Reality Mode - mix of reality and game
◈ The trick of soccer dribbling
◈ Ragdoll-physics of players and opponents
◈ Useful power-ups
◈ Abundance of tasks
◈ Daily rewards
◈ Fascinating fight for the ball
◈ 2 types of player management
◈ Optimized graphics. Play nice and the device works fine
◈ Frequent updates

Install and play Soccer Rush - Mobile Runner for free.
